channel.title: CVE Feed for Chromium -- libwebp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chromium -- libwebp

item.title: CVE-2023-1999|2024-08-02T06:05:27.124Z -- chromium -- libwebp
item.description: There exists a use after free/double free in libwebp. An attacker can use the ApplyFiltersAndEncode() function and loop through to free best.bw and assign best = trial pointer. The second loop will then return 0 because of an Out of memory error in VP8 encoder, the pointer is still assigned to trial and the AddressSanitizer will attempt a double free.
